definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding

sentences.english: Publication of academic works on more than 10 articles and two monographs.
sentences.chinese: 发表学术论著10余篇和参编专著2本。

sentences.english: "Jemima Puddleduck" is a treatise on enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 《杰迈玛泥潭鸭》是一部关于企业的专著。

sentences.english: "Vocal Music Theory"is the first system theoretical monographs of vocal art in Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《唱论》是我国元代一部声乐演唱理论专著。

sentences.english: He also wrote preface for the monograph.
sentences.chinese: 的高度评价，并为该专著作序。

sentences.english: Yuanye, written by Jicheng, is a unique technical monograph in Chinese gardening history.
sentences.chinese: 计成所著《园冶》是中国造园史上唯一的技术专著。

sentences.english: An experienced and accomplished researcher of Tibetology, he has published and presented many theses, essays, and novels.
sentences.chinese: 长期从事藏学研究，发表了大量的学术论文及专著有。

sentences.english: He is the chief editor of the publication "minimally invasive surgery and urology map".
sentences.chinese: 主编出版学术专著《微创泌尿外科手术与图谱》。

sentences.english: Uropathy, The Most Powerful Holistic Therapy, is more than just a treatise on the uses of urine.
sentences.chinese: “尿疗，最强大的整体疗法”不仅是尿液应用的专著。

sentences.english: She has recently published her fourth book with the Commercial Press.
sentences.chinese: 她最近在商务印书馆出版了她的第四本专著。

sentences.english: The first book of synergetics was published in 1977.
sentences.chinese: 第一本协同学专著出版于1977年。

sentences.english: Her family can hand out all of her professional publications at the wake.
sentences.chinese: 这也警醒她的家人尽快整理出版她的专著。

sentences.english: Ejiao appears very monographs, hence I also will not disturb her.
sentences.chinese: 阿娇显得很专著，于是我也便不去打扰她。

sentences.english: Dr Yu has published widely, including more than 150 papers and 15 books.
sentences.chinese: 俞博士发表了多达150篇论文及15本专著。

sentences.english: The monographs on criminal law have been published, but there is still room for further discussion.
sentences.chinese: 刑法研究方面虽有专著面世，但仍可续貂。

sentences.english: South China, the Sociology of Familism Vo1. I, Phenix Village, Kwangtung, china》.
sentences.chinese: 是一本中国农村的社会学调查的专著。

sentences.english: He has published essays and works on Yi culture of all-together millions of words.
sentences.chinese: 写出彝学专著及论文总计近百万字发表。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
